instructions_to_main_agent: Use the 'Sage Green' palette strictly. Do not revert to default blue/black.
Implement the 'Bento' grid for the product showcase on the landing page.
Use 'Playfair Display' for all Headings (H1-H3) to maintain the premium bakery feel.
Ensure the 'Hampers' customization flow allows selecting variants with dynamic pricing.
Use Shadcn components for the Dashboard and Forms, but style them with the 'Sage Green' theme (rounded-lg, soft shadows).
For the 'Eid Season' theme, add subtle Islamic geometric patterns or botanical motifs in the background (opacity 5%).
The 'Mini Hampers Sweet and Savory' must be merged into 'Hampers Personal Cookies'.
Payment proof upload is a critical feature - ensure the UI for this is clear and trustworthy.
Use the provided image URLs for the respective categories. Do not use placeholders.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
